DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate ability adalimumab combine methotrexate improve quality life patient active RA .
DOC.brief_title: Quality Life Study With Adalimumab Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Subject age 18 old good health ( Investigator discretion ) recent stable medical history Subject diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis define 1987 ACR criterion Subjects treatment failure criterion Mtx Mtx + another DMARD Subject consider investigator , reason , unsuitable candidate study Female subject pregnant breastfeeding consider become pregnant Previous treatment approve biological agent ( etanercept , infliximab , anakinra ) last 2 month
